## defineSchema() function

A helper function for defining type-safe JSON Schema.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function defineSchema<const T extends SchemaInferBase>(schema: SchemaDef<T>): SchemaDef<T>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

schema


</td><td>

[SchemaDef](./json-schema-typed.schemadef.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

The JSON Schema to define


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[SchemaDef](./json-schema-typed.schemadef.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

The input JSON Schema as is

## Remarks

This function validates the JSON Schema at compile time and returns the input schema as is at runtime.

## Example


```ts
const schema = defineSchema({
  type: "object",
  properties: {
    name: { type: "string" },
    age: { type: "number" }
  },
  required: ["name"]
});
```
